Show Available Parameters for interpret()

Source: R/shared_utils.R
show_interpret_args.Rd

Displays all available parameters for interpret with their defaults, types, valid ranges, and descriptions. Organizes parameters by configuration group (llm_args, output_args, interpretation_args) using CLI-formatted output.

Usage

show_interpret_args(analysis_type = NULL)

Arguments

analysis_type

Character or NULL. Model type to show parameters for:

  • NULL (default): Shows common parameters (llm_args + output_args) applicable to all models

  • "fa": Shows all parameters including FA-specific interpretation_args

  • "gm": Shows all parameters including GM-specific interpretation_args

When NULL, displays a message suggesting available analysis types.

Value

Invisibly returns a data.frame with parameter metadata. Primary output is CLI-formatted text printed to console.

Details

This function queries the centralized PARAMETER_REGISTRY to show current defaults and parameter specifications. It's particularly useful for:

  • Discovering available parameters for a specific model type

  • Checking default values before customizing

  • Understanding parameter types and valid ranges

  • Learning what each parameter controls

Parameters are organized by configuration group:

  • LLM Arguments (llm_args): Control LLM behavior (provider, model, word_limit, etc.)

  • Output Arguments (output_args): Control output formatting (format, silent, etc.)

  • Interpretation Arguments (interpretation_args): Model-specific settings (cutoff for FA, min_cluster_size for GM, etc.)

Examples

# Show common parameters for all models
show_interpret_args()
#> ℹ Showing common parameters for `interpret()`
#> ℹ Specify `analysis_type = 'fa'` or `analysis_type = 'gm'` to see model-specific `interpretation_args`
#> 
#> 
#> ── Llm args (llm_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   additional_info (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Additional context for LLM
#> 
#>   echo (character)
#>   Default: "\"none\""
#>   Allowed: "none", "output", "all"
#>   Echo level: 'none', 'output', 'all'
#> 
#>   interpretation_guidelines (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom interpretation guidelines for LLM
#> 
#>   llm_model (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM model name (e.g., 'gpt-4o-mini', 'claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022')
#> 
#>   llm_provider (character (required))
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM provider name (e.g., 'anthropic', 'openai', 'ollama')
#> 
#>   params (list)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   ellmer params object (created via ellmer::params())
#> 
#>   system_prompt (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom system prompt to override default
#> 
#>   word_limit (integer)
#>   Default: "150"
#>   Range: 20-500
#>   Maximum words for LLM interpretations
#> 
#> 
#> ── Output args (output_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   format (character)
#>   Default: "\"cli\""
#>   Allowed: "cli", "markdown"
#>   Output format: 'cli' or 'markdown'
#> 
#>   heading_level (integer)
#>   Default: "1"
#>   Range: 1-6
#>   Markdown heading level (1-6)
#> 
#>   max_line_length (integer)
#>   Default: "80"
#>   Range: 40-300
#>   Maximum line length for text wrapping (40-300)
#> 
#>   silent (integer)
#>   Default: "0"
#>   Range: 0-2
#>   Verbosity level: 0 (report+messages), 1 (messages only), 2 (silent)
#> 
#>   suppress_heading (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Suppress main heading in output
#> 

# \donttest{
# Show all parameters for Factor Analysis
show_interpret_args("fa")
#> 
#> ── Llm args (llm_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   additional_info (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Additional context for LLM
#> 
#>   echo (character)
#>   Default: "\"none\""
#>   Allowed: "none", "output", "all"
#>   Echo level: 'none', 'output', 'all'
#> 
#>   interpretation_guidelines (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom interpretation guidelines for LLM
#> 
#>   llm_model (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM model name (e.g., 'gpt-4o-mini', 'claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022')
#> 
#>   llm_provider (character (required))
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM provider name (e.g., 'anthropic', 'openai', 'ollama')
#> 
#>   params (list)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   ellmer params object (created via ellmer::params())
#> 
#>   system_prompt (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom system prompt to override default
#> 
#>   word_limit (integer)
#>   Default: "150"
#>   Range: 20-500
#>   Maximum words for LLM interpretations
#> 
#> 
#> ── Output args (output_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   format (character)
#>   Default: "\"cli\""
#>   Allowed: "cli", "markdown"
#>   Output format: 'cli' or 'markdown'
#> 
#>   heading_level (integer)
#>   Default: "1"
#>   Range: 1-6
#>   Markdown heading level (1-6)
#> 
#>   max_line_length (integer)
#>   Default: "80"
#>   Range: 40-300
#>   Maximum line length for text wrapping (40-300)
#> 
#>   silent (integer)
#>   Default: "0"
#>   Range: 0-2
#>   Verbosity level: 0 (report+messages), 1 (messages only), 2 (silent)
#> 
#>   suppress_heading (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Suppress main heading in output
#> 
#> 
#> ── Interpretation args (interpretation_args) - FA specific ──
#> 
#> 
#>   cutoff (numeric)
#>   Default: "0.3"
#>   Range: 0-1
#>   Minimum loading value to consider significant (FA only)
#> 
#>   hide_low_loadings (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Hide non-significant loadings in LLM prompt (FA only)
#> 
#>   n_emergency (integer)
#>   Default: "2"
#>   Range: 0+
#>   Top N loadings to use when none exceed cutoff (FA only)
#> 
#>   sort_loadings (logical)
#>   Default: "TRUE"
#>   Sort variables by loading strength within factors (FA only)
#> 

# Show all parameters for Gaussian Mixture Models
show_interpret_args("gm")
#> 
#> ── Llm args (llm_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   additional_info (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Additional context for LLM
#> 
#>   echo (character)
#>   Default: "\"none\""
#>   Allowed: "none", "output", "all"
#>   Echo level: 'none', 'output', 'all'
#> 
#>   interpretation_guidelines (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom interpretation guidelines for LLM
#> 
#>   llm_model (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM model name (e.g., 'gpt-4o-mini', 'claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022')
#> 
#>   llm_provider (character (required))
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM provider name (e.g., 'anthropic', 'openai', 'ollama')
#> 
#>   params (list)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   ellmer params object (created via ellmer::params())
#> 
#>   system_prompt (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom system prompt to override default
#> 
#>   word_limit (integer)
#>   Default: "150"
#>   Range: 20-500
#>   Maximum words for LLM interpretations
#> 
#> 
#> ── Output args (output_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   format (character)
#>   Default: "\"cli\""
#>   Allowed: "cli", "markdown"
#>   Output format: 'cli' or 'markdown'
#> 
#>   heading_level (integer)
#>   Default: "1"
#>   Range: 1-6
#>   Markdown heading level (1-6)
#> 
#>   max_line_length (integer)
#>   Default: "80"
#>   Range: 40-300
#>   Maximum line length for text wrapping (40-300)
#> 
#>   silent (integer)
#>   Default: "0"
#>   Range: 0-2
#>   Verbosity level: 0 (report+messages), 1 (messages only), 2 (silent)
#> 
#>   suppress_heading (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Suppress main heading in output
#> 
#> 
#> ── Interpretation args (interpretation_args) - GM specific ──
#> 
#> 
#>   covariance_type (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Allowed: "EII", "VII", "EEI", "VEI", "EVI", "VVI", "EEE", "VEE", "EVE",
#>   "VVE", "EEV", "VEV", "EVV", "VVV"
#>   Covariance structure for mclust models (GM only)
#> 
#>   min_cluster_size (integer)
#>   Default: "5"
#>   Range: 1-100
#>   Minimum meaningful cluster size for diagnostics (GM only)
#> 
#>   n_clusters (integer)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Range: 1-100
#>   Number of clusters (GM only)
#> 
#>   plot_type (character)
#>   Default: "\"auto\""
#>   Allowed: "auto", "heatmap", "parallel", "radar", "all"
#>   Visualization type for cluster profiles (GM only)
#> 
#>   profile_variables (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Subset of variables to focus on for interpretation (GM only)
#> 
#>   separation_threshold (numeric)
#>   Default: "0.3"
#>   Range: 0-1
#>   Overlap threshold for cluster separation diagnostics (GM only)
#> 
#>   weight_by_uncertainty (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Weight interpretations by cluster assignment certainty (GM only)
#> 

# Capture parameter data programmatically
params <- show_interpret_args("fa")
#> 
#> ── Llm args (llm_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   additional_info (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Additional context for LLM
#> 
#>   echo (character)
#>   Default: "\"none\""
#>   Allowed: "none", "output", "all"
#>   Echo level: 'none', 'output', 'all'
#> 
#>   interpretation_guidelines (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom interpretation guidelines for LLM
#> 
#>   llm_model (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM model name (e.g., 'gpt-4o-mini', 'claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022')
#> 
#>   llm_provider (character (required))
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   LLM provider name (e.g., 'anthropic', 'openai', 'ollama')
#> 
#>   params (list)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   ellmer params object (created via ellmer::params())
#> 
#>   system_prompt (character)
#>   Default: "NULL"
#>   Custom system prompt to override default
#> 
#>   word_limit (integer)
#>   Default: "150"
#>   Range: 20-500
#>   Maximum words for LLM interpretations
#> 
#> 
#> ── Output args (output_args) ──
#> 
#> 
#>   format (character)
#>   Default: "\"cli\""
#>   Allowed: "cli", "markdown"
#>   Output format: 'cli' or 'markdown'
#> 
#>   heading_level (integer)
#>   Default: "1"
#>   Range: 1-6
#>   Markdown heading level (1-6)
#> 
#>   max_line_length (integer)
#>   Default: "80"
#>   Range: 40-300
#>   Maximum line length for text wrapping (40-300)
#> 
#>   silent (integer)
#>   Default: "0"
#>   Range: 0-2
#>   Verbosity level: 0 (report+messages), 1 (messages only), 2 (silent)
#> 
#>   suppress_heading (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Suppress main heading in output
#> 
#> 
#> ── Interpretation args (interpretation_args) - FA specific ──
#> 
#> 
#>   cutoff (numeric)
#>   Default: "0.3"
#>   Range: 0-1
#>   Minimum loading value to consider significant (FA only)
#> 
#>   hide_low_loadings (logical)
#>   Default: "FALSE"
#>   Hide non-significant loadings in LLM prompt (FA only)
#> 
#>   n_emergency (integer)
#>   Default: "2"
#>   Range: 0+
#>   Top N loadings to use when none exceed cutoff (FA only)
#> 
#>   sort_loadings (logical)
#>   Default: "TRUE"
#>   Sort variables by loading strength within factors (FA only)
#> 
print(params)
